languages.text: {n}Усмехнувшись, змей склоняется к вам.{/n} "Верят каждому слову. И пока таких верующих достаточно, слуги гемункула никогда не потащат на арену меня. К чему им утруждать себя отловом мяса для арены, когда оно все здесь?"

{n}The snake laughs and leans toward you.{/n} "They believe every word of it. And as long as there are enough believers, the Haemonculus's servants won't drag me off to the arena. Why would they go to the effort of catching meat for the arena when it's all here waiting for them?"
languages.original_text: {n}Усмехнувшись, змей склоняется к вам.{/n} "Верят каждому слову. И пока таких верующих достаточно, слуги гемункула никогда не потащат на арену меня. К чему им утруждать себя отловом мяса для арены, когда оно все здесь?"

Why would they go to the effort of catching meat for the arena when it's all here waiting for them?"
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

Why would they go to the effort of catching meat for the arena when it's all here waiting for them?"
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}蛇人大笑起来，朝你靠了过来。{/n}“他们每个字都信了。只要信这种话的人足够多，血伶人的仆人就不会把我拖到竞技场里。既然活畜就在竞技场里等着他们，那他们干嘛还要费劲去自己抓呢？”
languages.original_text: {n}The snake laughs and leans toward you.{/n} "They believe every word of it. And as long as there are enough believers, the Haemonculus's servants won't drag me off to the arena. Why would they go to the effort of catching meat for the arena when it's all here waiting for them?"

traits.locale_text: {n}蛇人大笑起来，朝你靠了过来。{/n}“他们每个字都信了。只要信这种话的人足够多，血伶人的仆人就不会把我拖到竞技场里。既然肉就在竞技场里等着他们，那他们干嘛还要费劲去自己抓呢？”
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}La serpiente se ríe y se inclina hacia ti.{/n} «Se creen cada palabra. Y mientras haya suficientes creyentes, los sirvientes del Hemónculo no me llevarán a la arena. ¿Para qué iban a esforzarse en atrapar carne para la arena cuando la tienen esperando aquí?».
languages.original_text: {n}The snake laughs and leans toward you.{/n} "They believe every word of it. And as long as there are enough believers, the Haemonculus's servants won't drag me off to the arena. Why would they go to the effort of catching meat for the arena when it's all here waiting for them?"

traits.locale_text: {n}La serpiente se ríe y se inclina hacia ti.{/n} «Se creen cada palabra. Y mientras haya suficientes creyentes, los sirvientes del Hemónculo no me llevarán a la arena. ¿Para qué iban a esforzarse en atrapar carne para la arena cuando la tienen esperando aquí?».
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}蛇は笑い、前のめりになった。{/n}「私の言うことならすべて鵜呑みにしているぞ。信じる者が十分にいる限り、ハモンキュラスの従者が私をアリーナに連れて行くことはない。アリーナで使う肉がここに用意されているのに、彼らがわざわざ捕りに行く必要はないだろう？」
languages.original_text: {n}The snake laughs and leans toward you.{/n} "They believe every word of it. And as long as there are enough believers, the Haemonculus's servants won't drag me off to the arena. Why would they go to the effort of catching meat for the arena when it's all here waiting for them?"

traits.locale_text: {n}蛇は笑い、前のめりになった。{/n}「私の言うことならすべて鵜呑みにしているぞ。信じる者が十分にいる限り、ハモンキュラスの従者が私をアリーナに連れて行くことはない。アリーナで使う肉がここに用意されているのに、彼らがわざわざ捕りに行く必要はないだろう？」
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}Die Schlange lacht und beugt sich zu dir vor.{/n} "Sie glauben jedes Wort. Und so lange es genug Gläubige gibt, zerren die Diener des Haemonculus mich nicht in die Arena. Warum sollten sie sich die Mühe machen, Fleisch für die Arena zu fangen, wenn es hier schon auf sie wartet?"
languages.original_text: {n}The snake laughs and leans toward you.{/n} "They believe every word of it. And as long as there are enough believers, the Haemonculus's servants won't drag me off to the arena. Why would they go to the effort of catching meat for the arena when it's all here waiting for them?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Schlange lacht und beugt sich zu dir vor.{/n} "Sie glauben jedes Wort. Und so lange es genug Gläubige gibt, zerren die Diener des Haemonculus mich nicht in die Arena. Warum sollten sie sich die Mühe machen, Fleisch für die Arena zu fangen, wenn es hier schon auf sie wartet?"
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}Le serpent rit et se penche vers vous.{/n} « Ils en croient chaque mot. Et tant qu'il y aura suffisamment de dupes, les serviteurs de l'hémoncule ne me traîneront pas dans l'arène. Pourquoi se donneraient-ils la peine d'aller capturer de la chair fraîche pour les combats, alors qu'ils en ont à portée de main ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The snake laughs and leans toward you.{/n} "They believe every word of it. And as long as there are enough believers, the Haemonculus's servants won't drag me off to the arena. Why would they go to the effort of catching meat for the arena when it's all here waiting for them?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le serpent rit et se penche vers vous.{/n} « Ils en croient chaque mot. Et tant qu'il y aura suffisamment de dupes, les serviteurs de l'hémoncule ne me traîneront pas dans l'arène. Pourquoi se donneraient-ils la peine d'aller capturer de la chair fraîche pour les combats, alors qu'ils en ont à portée de main ? »
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}Yılan, kahkahayı basıp sana doğru eğiliyor.{/n} "Hem de kelimesi kelimesine. Yeterince inanan olduğu sürece Haimonkulus'un hizmetkârları beni arenaya sürüklemeyecektir. Arenada yitip gidecek zavallılar bulmakla neden uğraşsınlar ki? Bende sürüsüyle var."
languages.original_text: {n}The snake laughs and leans toward you.{/n} "They believe every word of it. And as long as there are enough believers, the Haemonculus's servants won't drag me off to the arena. Why would they go to the effort of catching meat for the arena when it's all here waiting for them?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yılan kahkahayı basıp sana doğru eğiliyor.{/n} "Hem de kelimesi kelimesine. Ve yeterince inanan olduğu sürece Haimonkulus'un hizmetkârları beni arenaya sürüklemeyecektir. Arenada yitip gidecek zavallılar bulmakla neden uğraşsınlar ki? Bende sürüsüyle var."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger
